button.name: action_confirm
button.invisible: state not in ('not_confirmed', 'no_show', 'waiting','block') or is_checkin_in_past or hide_confirm_button
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to confirm this booking?

button.name: action_cancel
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking?

button.name: action_waiting
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to send booking to waiting

button.name: action_block
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to block this booking?

button.name: action_unconfirm
button.invisible: state not in ('confirmed', 'cancel', 'waiting') or is_checkin_in_past or hide_unconfirm_button
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to not confirm this booking?

button.name: action_checkin
button.invisible: state not in ('block', 'check_out') or is_checkin_in_past or hide_confirm_button or hide_admin_buttons
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to check-in this booking?

button.name: action_checkout
button.invisible: state != 'check_in' or is_checkin_in_past or hide_confirm_button or hide_admin_buttons
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to check-out this booking?

button.name: no_show
button.invisible: state not in ('block') or hide_confirm_button or hide_admin_buttons
button.confirm: Are you sure you want to no show this booking?
